import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import '../Style/readbooks.css' const ReadBooks = () => { let params=useParams() let bookId=params.id let[book,setBook]=useState({}) use let{id,title,pageCount,thumbnailUrl,shortDescription,longDescription,status,authors,categories}=book return ( <>
) } export default ReadBooks
